body: The art style and the story so far is still fine

The art style and the story is simply fascinating, the author clearly belongs with the original creators team, this is S tier fanfiction.

The goblin rape part is a bit extreme,
But its a fucking goblin slayer parody
What did you expect?

For some reasons It makes me happy to see someone putting this much effort into a piece of hentai doujinshi
Or anything for that matter 

Countless people have lived and died before us, and countless more will in the future, but no one's life means anything really,

And it wouldn't take more than a few decades for our existence to be completly forgotten in the merciless march of time, as if we have never existed

It must feel good, being able to capture a piece of your imagination, your thoughts, your personality, which are the result of every single thing that happened to you during your life and immortalize it as piece of entertainment for other to witness in the future


Allowing your existence to exceed your brief mortal life span
So.... The priestess became the last boss or smth?
